name: Catlas
desc: Catlas is an all-in-one POS and Inventory Management system designed to revolutionize your business operations. With Catlas, you can efficiently manage your inventory, streamline sales processes, and gain real-time insights into your business performance. Experience a seamless Point of Sale (POS) system with an intuitive interface, ensuring faster and smoother transactions.

name: Keo Countries
desc: KeoCountries is an api to get the list of countries, states, cities, with easy queries.
